sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT #sPrtAtCode# AS S_PRT_AT_CODE, #sFrDt# AS S_FR_DT, #sToDt# AS S_TO_DT, #sExmpAgentCode# AS S_EXMP_AGENT_CODE, #sVsslKey# AS S_VSSL_KEY, FEE_TP, DECODE(P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#, FEE_TP),'-1','','-2','','-3','',P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(#sPrtAtCode#, FEE_TP)) FEE_TP_NM, SUM(EXMP_AMNT) SUM_EXMP_AMNT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR
WHERE 1=1
AND APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND BILL_DT >= #sFrDt# AND BILL_DT <= #sToDt#
AND EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sExmpAgentCode#
AND VSSL_KEY = #sVsslKey#
GROUP BY FEE_TP
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(FEE_TP)) TOTCNT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR
WHERE 1=1
AND APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND BILL_DT >= #sFrDt# AND BILL_DT <= #sToDt#
AND EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sExmpAgentCode#
AND VSSL_KEY = #sVsslKey#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, CMPL_YR, CONST_NO, APP_PRT_AT_CODE, APP_AGENT_CODE, USE_NO, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, SOC_NO, EXMP_AMNT, EXMP_AGENT_CODE, BILL_NO, CALL_LETTER, YR||' - ' || SER_NO YR, IN_OUT, BILL_USE_NO, FAC_CODE, FAC_SUB_CODE, TO_CHAR(IO_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IO_DT, DECODE(DC_CODE,'1','20','2','50','3', '80','4','100', '0') RATE_NM, DC_CODE, TO_CHAR(BILL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILL_DT, STANDARD_FEE, P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_KOR_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_KOR_NM, P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_CODE_NM, DECODE(P2MGR.SF_FACIL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_PRT_AT_CODE, FAC_CODE, FAC_SUB_CODE),'-1','','-2','','-3','',P2MGR.SF_FACIL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_PRT_AT_CODE, FAC_CODE, FAC_SUB_CODE)) FACIL_NM, DECODE(P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP),'-1','','-2','','-3','',P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(APP_PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP)) FEE_TP_NM, DECODE(P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(EXMP_AGENT_CODE), '-1','','-2','','-3','',P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(EXMP_AGENT_CODE)) AGENT_NM, DECODE(P2MGR.SF_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(VSSL_KEY), '-1','','-2','','-3','',P2MGR.SF_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(VSSL_KEY)) VSSL_NM, REAL_TN, (PRT_AT_CODE||CMPL_YR||CONST_NO||FEE_TP) GPFIELD FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR
WHERE 1=1
AND APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND BILL_DT >= #sFrDt# AND BILL_DT <= #sToDt#
AND FEE_TP = #feeTp#
AND EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sExmpAgentCode#
AND VSSL_KEY = #sVsslKey#
ORDER BY PRT_AT_CODE, CMPL_YR, CONST_NO, FEE_TP, BILL_DT
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT , NVL(SUM(EXMP_AMNT),0) AS SUM_EXMP_AMNT FROM P2MGR.SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR
WHERE 1=1
AND APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode# AND BILL_DT >= #sFrDt# AND BILL_DT <= #sToDt#
AND FEE_TP = #feeTp#
AND EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sExmpAgentCode#
AND VSSL_KEY = #sVsslKey#
